title: Spider-Man PS5: They Recast Peter Parker - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.30.20
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg react to some bombshells -- a new face for Peter Parker, crunch on Cyberpunk, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:06:10 - Housekeeping
Donktober begins this Saturday
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Tom Bock, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:00 - They Recast Spider-Man, James on the Blog
00:24:30 - Spider-Man: Miles Morales Saves Can Transfer from PS4 to PS5, Gabe Gurwin @ GameSpot
00:31:10 - Crunch at CD Projekt Red, Jason @ Bloomberg
00:43:50 - How is this practice different than all the retail workers who have to put in long hours during the holiday season?  - Best Friends Q:Parker Petrov
00:44:48 - In regards to reports on crunch on Cyberpunk 2077, why are so many people’s arguments defending crunch boil down to “hey I have forced overtime.” or “I get overworked too.”?  - Best Friends Q:Witt
00:51:50 - New Smash Fighter tomorrow
00:57:05 - Out today
01:01:45 -  Upstart 
01:03:05 -  HIMS
01:04:30 -  Logitech
 Reader mail   -
01:06:35 - Why are people cheering on Microsoft as if they are a small startup? - Alfie
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
